name: New Super Mario All-Stars HD
summary:
New Super Mario All-Stars HD is a mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii which recreates many Super Mario Bros. games in the NSMB engine.

List of recreations:

Donkey Kong
Mario Bros.
Super Mario Bros.
Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels
Super Mario Bros. 2
Super Mario Land
Super Mario Land 2: 6 Golden Coins
Super Mario Bros. 3
Super Mario World
Mario is Missing!
Hotel Mario
